definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The subject that how the humanity characteristics of Hakkas are formed attracts many scholars' attentions.
sentences.chinese: 关于客家人文特质的形成，是学者比较关注的问题。

sentences.english: The stability of the above characteristics, and can be called the Hakka.
sentences.chinese: 凡符合上述稳定特征的人，可以称为客家人。

sentences.english: The presence of Hakkas is pan-China.
sentences.chinese: 在场的客家人是泛中国。

sentences.english: Hakkas has a unique spirit of the Hakka.
sentences.chinese: 客家人具有独特的客家精神。

sentences.english: Hakka people are very passinate and their folkway is honest.
sentences.chinese: 客家人非常好客，民风纯朴。

sentences.english: Hakka people once played a positive role in the woodcut movement.
sentences.chinese: 就全国的木刻运动而言，客家人在诸多方面开了先河。

sentences.english: Yue and Hakka are both part of modern Han.
sentences.chinese: 越人和客家人都是现代汉人的族群之一。

sentences.english: The food can almost tell the hardship Hakka people had to endure while they left their homeland.
sentences.chinese: 从这些菜式就可以想象客家人离乡别井时所受的艰辛。

sentences.english: Hakka is a distinctive Chinese Patriarchal clan.
sentences.chinese: 客家人是汉民族的一个民系。

sentences.english: Hakka Earth Building is a circular model of residential living.
sentences.chinese: 圆形土楼是客家人居住的典范民居。

sentences.english: Hakka people's ardent enthusiasm influenced every visitor.
sentences.chinese: 客家人火炽的热情感染了每一位游客。

sentences.english: The south of Jiangxi province is the main habitation of Hakkas.
sentences.chinese: 赣南是客家人的主要聚居地。

sentences.english: What then is the Hakkas it?
Hakka offsprings are diligent and intelligent.
sentences.chinese: 客家人的后代既勤奋又聪明。

definition: Hakka ethnic group, a subgroup of the Han that in the 13th century migrated from northern China to the south
Chaoshan, conurbation in the east of Guangdong 廣東|广东[Guang3 dong1]
Hoklo people, southern Chinese people of Taiwan
Dabu county in Meizhou 梅州, Guangdong/Tai Po district of New Territories, Hong Kong/Dabu or Tabu township in Chiayi county 嘉義縣|嘉义县[Jia1 yi4 xian4], west Taiwan
Chaozhou prefecture-level city in Guangdong 廣東省|广东省[Guang3 dong1 sheng3]/Chaochou town in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
Yao ethnic group of southwest China and southeast Asia
